QuestData.Title: The Deadliest Catch
QuestData.Description: Oi! No time to waste!$b$bSeems Deepwarden had one more thing up his sleeve... and it's the catch of the day!$b$bThis'll be a hunt for the ages, and I won't let ya miss out.$b$bOkri will fly you out to the wall. Get ready!
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Okri to the sea gate, then kill Viq'Goth.
QuestData.RewardText: My inadequacy to rule lead to Deepwarden's near takeover of not only the fishing operation here, but the village as a whole.$b$bI can no longer allow myself to sit quietly and allow people like him to walk over me to do as they please! I've learned that, thanks to you.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Okri for a ride
Talk to the Outrigger Engineer to repel Viq'Goth
